title: Celestial Nocturne
subtitle: Runway gown embroidery program

heroMedia.alt: Couture gown detail under dramatic atelier lighting

overview: A midnight silk silhouette animated by sequins, crystals, and thread gradients that moved like a constellation.
challenge: Translate celestial references into embroidery that stayed fluid and lightweight for movement.
approach: Mapped embellishment density in zones, balancing highlight points with breathable negative space.
outcome: Delivered final pieces across three fittings with zero rework in the final two rounds.

title: Gilded Botanical
subtitle: Couture jacket capsule

heroMedia.alt: Tailored couture piece with ornate embroidery

overview: A study in raised metallic flora layered across tailored couture jackets.
challenge: Create relief and light play while preserving drape at shoulder and sleeve junctions.
approach: Built relief hierarchy with corded channels and selective padding for controlled projection.
outcome: Collection featured in seasonal showroom and adopted as a repeat client custom request.

title: Porcelain Garden
subtitle: Bridal couture ensemble

thumbnail.alt: Soft floral embroidery with pearl details

heroMedia.alt: Bridal couture look with ornate handcrafted details

overview: Hand-layered pearl and floral compositions inspired by antique porcelain painting.
challenge: Maintain visual softness while coordinating multiple artisan teams for delivery milestones.
approach: Defined technique ownership by panel and introduced color-calibrated sample cards.
outcome: Completed full set ahead of deadline with consistent stitch language across all garment sections.
